issue.description:
si_nc03::T2 Multiplex Add/Remove
Step: Country:UK 1.Factory reset,DVB-T auto tuning Freq:474Mhz(TS:nc03a_21c_2k_64qam_cr23_gi32_8.10.ts) 2.進行至step10: Power-off the receiver,Play out the transport stream files nc03f_21c: : :.ts and nc03f_22c: : :.ts. DO NOT LOOP THE STREAM Freq:474Mhz(TS:nc03f_21c_2k_64qam_cr23_gi32_8.10) Freq:482Mhz(DVB-T2)(nc03f_22c_t2_32k_256qam_cr35_gi1128_8.10.ts.ts) 3.Power on,在TS時間3:02s時會出現"Multiplex Add UPDATE NOW"OSD,按yes進行確認 Result:請確認此時出現OSD是否正確? 4.等待update成功後TS播放至311s時Power off 5.Play out the transport stream files nc03g_21c: : :.ts and nc03g_22c: : :.ts. Freq:474Mhz(TS:nc03g_21c_2k_64qam_cr23_gi32_8.10.ts) Freq:482Mhz(T2)(TS:nc03g_22c_t2_32k_256qam_cr35_gi1128_8.10.ts) 6.讓TS播放約301s後power on(step12) 7.Power-off the receiver. Play out the transport stream files nc03h_21c: : :.ts and nc03h_22c: : :.ts.(Step15) Freq:474Mhz(TS:nc03h_21c_2k_64qam_cr23_gi32_8.10.ts) Freq:482Mhz(T2)(TS:nc03h_22c_t2_32k_256qam_cr35_gi1128_8.10.ts) 8.Power-off the receiver. Play out the transport stream files nc03i_21c: : :.ts and nc03i_22c: : :.ts. DO NOT LOOP THE STREAM. Freq:474Mhz(TS:nc03i_21c_2k_64qam_cr23_gi32_8.10.ts) Freq:482Mhz(T2)(TS:nc03i_22c_t2_32k_256qam_cr35_gi1128_8.10.ts) 9.Turn on the receiver at the beginning of the stream. 10.Select service NCT 2 Result:在TS時間2:30時,畫面顯示黑屏,在TS時間3:00時出現update的OSD後進行update,channel 顯示錯誤 Expect Result: Mandatory Interval 181->301 The engineering period has completed while the HD receiver is tuned to NCT 2, the receiver shall ncprocess and may re-tune to an invariant service NCT 1, NCT 3 or NCT 5. An SD receiver shall not be interrupted or disturbed for the duration of the change. No updates shall be stored, notified or be present.
NCD.11b Mandatory Interval 181->301 The resultant revised channel list following the change shall comprise 3 services as follows: 1 – “NCT 1” Television service. 3 – “NCR 3” Radio service. 5 – “NCD 5” Data service.

issue.description:
1.62 LS-30c: HD Audio Characteristics (Audio Description - Fade Value)
Country:UK Step: 1.DVBT2 Auto tuning:UK_T2_LS_TS6_9.10.ts 碼流卡設定如下: Stream Configuration - DTG109 Bit Rate: 40,214,645bps Duration: 179 seconds Bandwidth: 8 MHz Transmission Mode: 32K Code Rate: 2/3 Guard Interval: 1/128 Hierarchy: Non-hierarchical Modulation: 256-QAM 2.Receiver is tuned to TS6 service “HD1 EAC3” (LCN 101). 3.Audio Description ON. 4.使用audio analyzer(APx500)連接至平台的耳機孔 5.在0~60s調整音量使AP的level值顯示在-6db
result: Interval 60s-180s時，CH1數值顯示為-17dbm 、CH2數值在-47db (NG1.mp4)
spec expect result: Verify the main audio is NOT fading over the time and the main audio loudness is -6dB throughout the test. See Note 1 (Valid only for E-AC-3).
6.Receiver is tuned to TS6 service “HD2 MPEG Layer 2” (LCN 102). result: AD on狀態下，Interval 0-60s ,數值CH2永遠顯示-32db(NG2.mp4)
spec expect result: The Main Audio : continuous beep. AD : intermittent beep. (every 3sec) Verify the AD is playing along with the Main Audio. Verify the main audio is presenting on the left channel and the Audio description is presenting on both channels. Verify the main audio is not faded and the left channel audio shall be presented as the Diagram 1- Interval 0-60 seconds example.
7.在0~60s調整音量使AP的level值顯示在-6db 8.Interval 60s-100s result: CH1值顯示-12(NG3.mp4) spec expect result: Verify the main audio is faded by 12dB relevant 0-60second interval. (Main audio loudness of Left channel shall be reduced to -18dB.)
9.Interval 100s-140s result: CH1數值顯示-12(NG4.mp4) spec expect result: Verify the main audio is faded by 24dB relevant 0-60second interval. (Main audio loudness of Left channel shall be reduced to -30dB.)
10.Interval 140s-180s result: CH1數值顯示-12 CH2數值顯示-33 result: Verify the main audio is muted and only the audio description is presented on both channels.
11.Receiver is tuned to TS6 service “HD3 HEAAC” (LCN 103).
result: AD聲音mute.後續測項值無法量測

issue.description:
1.3 Test_3 - HE-AAC audio decoding
Country:UK Step 1.DVBT2 Auto tuning:t2_example_dynamic_stereo_to_5_1_9.10.ts 碼流卡設定如下: The NIT specifies UHF channel 45 (666 MHz). The modulation parameters to achieve this are, for DVB-T2: • Parameter group DTG DBook, ref DTG109. 2.使用audio analyzer(APx500)連接至平台的耳機孔 3.Select Channel:LCN 201. 4.調整音量使AP的level值顯示在-18db 5.切台至LCN202 ,確認AP的level值顯示與LCN201值一樣 6.切台至LCN203
result: AP的level值顯示與LCN201不同(CH1 and CH2)
spec expect result: The receiver is now tuned to “Ref Level Test Test”. The video sequence changes at around the half way point in the stream, from stereo to 5.1. You will be able to see the identity at the top of the video change accordingly. When receivers perform: a) the correct stereo downmix and b) the correct level normalisation to a target_level of -23 dB There will be no level difference between the stereo bit stream segments and the 5.1 bit stream segments down mixed to stereo. The volume levels will also be identical to those of service 201. Note: Please take the audio level measurements when all channels are highlighted. 1.4 Test_4 - E-AC3 audio decoding Version V5.0 Requirements

issue.description:
1.64 LS-30e: HD Audio Characteristics (Default Fade and Pan)
Country:UK Step: 1.DVBT2 Auto tuning:UK_T2_LS_TS6_9.10.ts 碼流卡設定如下: Stream Configuration - DTG109 Bit Rate: 40,214,645bps Duration: 179 seconds Bandwidth: 8 MHz Transmission Mode: 32K Code Rate: 2/3 Guard Interval: 1/128 Hierarchy: Non-hierarchical Modulation: 256-QAM 2.Receiver is tuned to TS6 service “HD1 EAC3” (LCN 101). 3.AD off 4.使用audio analyzer(APx500)連接至平台的耳機孔 5.Interval 0-60s紀錄L1數值 (看到CH1數值為-2.785db) 6.Interval 0-60s, AD on

result: NG1:ts到1m:05s左右，會遮黑約1sec,然後才顯示Channnel畫面+ info banner ,且下方出現OSD殘影、以及出現OSD:Multiplex Add UPDATE_NOW. NG2:出現OSD:Multiplex Add UPDATE_NOW，選YES,打開Channel list:顯示1 SIT1、2 SIT 2b
麻煩請確認出現上述OSD是否正確? 出現OSD後選YES, Channel list行為是否正確?

The receiver should process the change and the video, audio and subtitle components on this service should be maintained without the need for any setup operation.

issue.description:
1.2 si_nc02::Major Multiplex Add/Remove
Case.1 Step: Country:UK 1.依照NCD SPEC從Step10(Step1~step9請參Test SPEC) 2.Power-off the receiver. Play out the transport stream files nc02f_21c: : :.ts and nc02f_22c(DO NOT LOOP THE STREAM)(Step10) Freq:474Mhz(TS:nc02f_21c_2k_64qam_cr23_gi32_8.10.ts) Freq:482Mhz(TS:nc02f_22c_2k_64qam_cr23_gi32_8.10.ts) 3.Select service NCT 1(Step10) 4.等待TS時間121s~191s Result:channel list未更新 Expect Result: Ensure the nc02f transport streams are played to the receiver between 121 to 191 seconds to ensure the receiver sees the engineering period. At 191s the engineering period completes.
The receiver shall nc-process the changes and the revised channel list shall comprise 6 services as follows: 1 – “NCT 1” Television service. 2 – “NCT 2” Television service. 3 – “NCR 3” Radio service. 4 – “NCR 4” Radio service. 5 – “NCD 5” Data service. 6 – “NCD 6” Data service. Step12要在191s關機,所以請確認在121s~191s是否要進行channel update?
Case.2 延續上一個測試 5.進行至Step16 Power-off the receiver. Play out the transport stream files nc02i_21c: : :.ts and nc02i_22c: : :.ts with a cell_id of 0xffff. DO NOT LOOP THE STREAM. Turn on the receiver at the beginning of the stream. Select service NCT 2. 6.在TS時間0~120s時 Result:未顯示訊息,請確認是否支援? Expect Result: Mandatory Interval 0->121 On power-on, the receiver shall not show a message indicating that a network change is scheduled. A receiver displaying a network change message with information “Wednesday 18th November 2015 04:00:00 for 01:00” optionally designated as a minor change with message “Eng: Frequency delete & some text at the maximum length of two hundred (200) characters. The last character of the string is the hash (#) character which appears right at the end and must be visible #” shall fail this test.
7.在TS時間2:30時 Result:NCT2顯示黑屏 8.在TS時間3:00 Result 2:出現OSD"multiplex Removed UPDATE_NOW",選yes進行update -->請確認此OSD是否應該顯示?

issue.description:
1.18 LS-10a: SD Audio Characteristics (AV timing)
Country:UK
Step: 1.DVB-T2 Auto tuning Freq:474Mhz(DVB-T2) TS:UK_T2_LS_TS1_9.10.ts 2.CH 101 DTG SD1 3.選擇Audio Track:Welsh 4.使用Webcam錄影 5.將錄好的影片使用播放軟體Camtasia Studio 8確認Audio/Video
Result:量出來值不符合spec(video比audio慢一些)
expect result: The scale on the left of the test card is calibrated in frames: 40ms per division.
A measurement ‘by eye’ will be no better than ±80ms. A more accurate method is to use a light sensor to register the ‘flash’ on one channel of an oscilloscope, the audio being on the other channel.
or follow the test procedure in the summary section
From D-Book :- “audio is presented to the viewer no more than 20 ms before the video and no more than 40 ms after it.”
